description:
'''Seo Jung-kwon''' ({{korean|hangul=서정권}}; born July 29, 1974), also known as '''Tiger JK''', is a [[Korean Americans|South Korea-born American]] rapper, record producer, and entrepreneur based in South Korea. He is best known as a founding member of [[Korean hip hop]] group [[Drunken Tiger]]. He has also founded two record labels, Jungle Entertainment and [[Feel Ghood Music]].{{Unreliable source?|reason=See reliable sources list on [[WP:KO/RS]]|date=December 2024}} He is a member of the South Korean hip hop trio [[MFBTY]].

He is considered a highly influential figure in the development of Korean hip-hop and is credited with helping bring the genre into the Korean mainstream.{{Unreliable source?|reason=See reliable sources list on [[WP:KO/RS]]|date=December 2024}} ''The Los Angeles Times'' referred to him in 2011 as "perhaps the most popular Korean rapper in America, Asia and the world."
